data.title: Why Women Don’t Apply for Jobs Unless They’re 100% Qualified
data.meta_description: It’s not because they lack confidence.
data.text:
TM

Tara Mohr is an expert on women’s leadership and the author of Playing Big: Find Your Voice, Your Mission, Your Message, named a best book of the year by Apple’s iBooks. She is the creator of the Playing Big Facilitators Training program for coaches, mentors, managers and leadership development professionals who want to support women in playing bigger. Access more articles and resources from Tara here.
